EmailTemplate.description: Sent when a case is closed - Off 5th English
EmailTemplate.name: Case - Closed Email (O5 English)
EmailTemplate.subject: We’ve resolved your issue
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for contacting us. We’re happy we were able to assist you in resolving your issue. If you have any more questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us again and refer to case {!Case.CaseNumber}.
CONTACT US
Sincerely, {!Case.Business_Unit__c} Customer Service
{!Case.Thread_Id}
